# app-example

## create app
```
{
    "title": "Example App",
    "description": "App com backend",
    "name": "Example App",
    "slug": "exampleapp",
    "createdBy": "example.com",
    "uri": "https://example.com",
    "scope": ["profile"],
    "redirect_uris": ["https://example.com"],
    "kind": "app",    
    "image": ""
}
```

## get client credentials

```
http://exchange.com/api/v3/private/apps/exampleapp/credentials
```
